definition: over and over again/again and again
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)

sentences.english: As this newspaper has repeatedly argued.
Roger repeated denials of the charges against him.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑再三否認套在他身上的罪名。

sentences.english: Together the two of them tried repeatedly to move him, but with no success.
sentences.chinese: 他們兩個一起再三勸他動位置，但是沒有成功。

sentences.english: After much cogitation , I decide to resign.
sentences.chinese: 我經過再三考慮決定辭職。

sentences.english: As ths transaction involves a very large sum, buyers have to think twice before deciding.
sentences.chinese: 由於這筆交易金額很大，買主在決定前必須再三考慮。

sentences.english: The idea for today needs many repetitions for maximum benefit.
sentences.chinese: 若要達到最大的成效，必須再三複誦今天的觀念。

sentences.english: Her requests had been met with skepticism and repeated, stubborn denials.
sentences.chinese: 她的懇求遭到懷疑和再三的堅決的否認。

sentences.english: Well, my dear, I wish you joy of it again and again;
sentences.chinese: 好啦，親愛的，我再三再四地祝你快樂。

sentences.english: But shoppers have been made hesitant by high unemployment and falling home prices.
sentences.chinese: 然而高企的失業率和下跌的房價卻令購物者躊躇再三。

sentences.english: Thirty minutes earlier, I triple-checked the address scrawled in my notebook.
sentences.chinese: 三十分鐘前，我再三確認記事本上草草寫就的地址。

sentences.english: After much cogitation I have decided to resign.
sentences.chinese: 我經過再三考慮後決定辭職。

sentences.english: We are repeatedly told that consumer spending is all-important for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 我們一直被再三地告知，消費對於經濟發展至關重要。

sentences.english: The world is tired of the death blurting out or muttering again and again.
sentences.chinese: 世界厭倦透了脫口而出或再三沉吟的死亡。

sentences.english: If you believe you don’t have anything to give, think again.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信你沒有任何可以給與的東西，請再三考慮。

sentences.english: They checked, rechecked and triple-checked the plan.
sentences.chinese: 他們再三檢查了這個方案。

sentences.english: The speeches from Jobs turned to hot spot again and again.
sentences.chinese: 喬布斯生前地演講成爲大師幾回再三轉評地熱點。

definition: to consider/to deliberate/to fill up a cup to the brim
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
to be determined to/to insist on
to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles/to ponder
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
lit. twice then three times (idiom); fig. repeatedly/over and over again
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
